alert.note: Alert for Eastern Magic Valley; Lower Snake River Plain; Raft River Region (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 20 at 6:09PM MDT by NWS Pocatello
info.description: ...Line of thunderstorms north of Cold Water moving northeast toward American Falls Reservoir and Sterling through 700 PM MDT... At 606 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a line of thunderstorms extending from 12 miles west of Aberdeen to 6 miles northwest of Cold Water Rest Area, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts to 30 mph, occasional lightning, and brief moderate rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... American Falls, Neeley, American Falls Reservoir, southern Lake Walcott, Aberdeen, Cold Water Rest Area, Springfield, Taber, Sterling, Pilar Butte, and Massacre Rocks. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. If on or near American Falls Reservoir, consider moving to shore. Strong winds will create rough chop. Lightning can strike out to 10 miles from the parent thunderstorm. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Magic Valley; Lower Snake River Plain; Raft River Region
